alert.note: Alert for Banks; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Banks, eastern Hall and central Jackson Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Mossy Creek to Lula to near Maysville, and moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Jefferson, Commerce, Lula, Maysville, Arcade, Clermont, Pendergrass, Gillsville, Talmo, Peach State Speedway and Apple Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
